task: pick up the black bowl on the stove and place it on the plate
fail_annotations: Take the black bowl from the stove, hold it securely, and place it on the plate — avoid spilling any contents if there are any.
Locate the black bowl resting on the stove, lift it with precision, and place it exactly on the plate nearby — make sure it’s centered.
Reach for the black bowl on the stove, lift it with your hand, and set it down on the plate, ensuring it’s stable and properly positioned.

task: pick up the black bowl next to the plate and place it on the plate
